comment.author: Haley
comment.text: President Obama is a legend in this own mind. He has tried but failed. America is in sad shape because of him and the previous two Presidents (wild willie and busted bush). It's time for Obama to move on, open the doors and let the Trump Train into the white house. He also need to stop lying about Killary and how great she is. Tell the truth and what he feels in his heart about Killary.

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: He stopped working the day he got re elected ..
